name: Alien 8 Remake
overview: This remake for the MSX 2 computer of the monochromatic 8-bit isometric classic adds colors and fixes some of the bugs of the original game. The gameplay remains the same: the player has to guide a small maintenance robot through the rooms of a spaceship, navigating around obstacles to activate the cryogenic chambers that give life support for the crew. The game supports keyboard and joystick controls.
